sections.title: Validity of function pointers
sections.content:
**This page has been archived**

It did not actually reflect current language guarantees and caused frequent confusion.

The old content can be accessed on GitHub.

paragraphs.ucg_validity_of_function_pointers_p2: It did not actually reflect current language guarantees and caused frequent confusion.
paragraphs.ucg_validity_of_function_pointers_p3: The old content can be accessed on GitHub.
